section.title: Managing and Monitoring JAIN SLEE Service Building Blocks (SBBs)
View SBB Summary
section.para: In the top, at the summary section, some details regarding the SBB can be seen, such as the Component ID (in Description), the Version, the State Code (UP/DOWN) and its Parent Component (JSLEE Server).

section.title: Monitor JAIN SLEE SBB Availability over time
section.para: By accessing the MONITOR tab it's possible to see a graph showing the availability of the SBB over time.
